turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Uh I'd like to order a small um um I really would like the veggie lovers pizza uh make sure it has mushrooms, green peppers and tomatoes and olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the veggie lovers usually doesn't come with olives but you can add that on.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please, I would love olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, did you want the same pizza for both?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any other requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Make sure that they both have thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so i have 2 small thick crust veggie lover pizzas with olives, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $26, would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your pizzas delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to pick them up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. I will be there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, just show it at the counter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, I will do that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: nothing else today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will. Thank you.
